snippet.title: Disciples III: Renaissance Trailer
snippet.description: Kalypso Media, a global publisher of award-winning PC and console games, today released an exciting new trailer for the upcoming epic turn-based sword and sorcery title - Disciples III: Renaissance. This new video boasts all new gameplay footage showcasing some of the many amazing fantasy creatures and enemies players will encounter in their quests through the magical world of Nevendaar. Disciples III: Renaissance will be available on Windows PC across Europe in June 2010.For more information on Disciples III: Renaissance go to www.disciples3.com
